context.p: This task is a variant on the task in which the customer is searched by customer code. Now you should create a form with the data of a box and on that form a combo box for searching the BoxCode.

The base of the form can be made with a default form. The choice list is a Combo Box. You need to create a macro for performing two tasks. First go to the combo box and get the box code from ther. Then find the corresponding record..

step.cmd: Create a new form with combo box and name it Search box by code.
Create the macro and name it Search box by code.
Open form Search box by code and test the working of the combo box.
